item.title: Report X-2023061659
item.description:
Report X-2023061659

Identified by scraper @ 2023-07-25T15:12:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-06-23
  • City: LOWELL
  • State: AR
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The lid had a faulty seal. slight leakage due to sloshing during transport. Leakage did not escape outer box. Package was placed in Hazmat bag and drum. DescribePack: faulty seal at lid. DurationRel: 4 and MitigateEffect: placed in hazmat bag and drum.
